des: "Coquito is a coconut tasting beverage originating from Puerto Rico, popular during the Christmas season. My grandmother and my mother use to prepare it as I was growing up, and the tradition has stayed with me!"
ins: Pour the water, milk, rum, and coconut milk into a blender.  Add the cinnamon and salt.  Blend until well combined, then refrigerate for at least one hour, or until ready to serve.
